name: takeoff-ui
author: Turkish Technology Frontend Infrastructure Team < takeoffui@thy.com >

scripts.dev:vue: turbo run build --filter=@takeoff-ui/core --filter=@takeoff-ui/vue && cd apps/vue-app && pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:react: turbo run build --filter=@takeoff-ui/core --filter=@takeoff-ui/react && cd apps/react-app && pnpm run dev
scripts.dev:ng: turbo run build --filter=@takeoff-ui/core --filter=@takeoff-ui/angular && cd packages/angular && pnpm run start
scripts.dev:docs: turbo run build --filter=@takeoff-ui/core --filter=@takeoff-ui/react && cd docs && pnpm run generate-docs && pnpm run start
scripts.format: prettier --write "**/*.{ts, tsx, js, jsx, d.ts, d.js, vue}" --cache
scripts.publish: pnpm run build && pnpm publish --filter=@takeoff-ui/core --filter=@takeoff-ui/react --filter=@takeoff-ui/vue --filter=@takeoff-ui/angular --filter=@takeoff-ui/tailwind --access public --no-git-checks

*.{tsx,ts,js}: prettier --write "**/*.{ts, tsx, js, jsx, d.ts, d.js, vue}" --cache
